ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Retailer_Type__c, "SO"), ISPICKVAL(Retailer_Type__c, "Combo")), RecordType.Name = "Viasat", ISBLANK(Welcome_Email_Sent__c), ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"),
OR( ISBLANK(SO_Number__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure the SO Number field is filled in before saving the record.
